channel.title: Colours?
channel.description:
Hey, ive been downloading autoers for hours...and i get frustrated because they wont work. and i KNOW im doing somethen wrong, i just dont know what that is..anyway can someone answer me these two questions
colours? can someone gimme a list of colour codes. e,g yews 264, 2746 i dont know.
why do we have to enter our password?

item.title: Colours?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

The colours are changed every time you refresh the runescape page (e.g. to stop autoers) thats why you have to reset them.

Or i believe you can still use scarscape which is a runescape client which doesnt change the colours… have a search for it.

And i dont know why you have to enter your password? maybe is because it has “auto login” and it needs to use ure password to do that…

Read full topic
